Key Match Events: Pakistan chase 205 to keep slender semi-final hopes alive
Bangladesh bowled out for 204, become first team to be eliminated
Fakhar Zaman scores 81 off 74 balls, Shafique adds 68
Post-Match Reflections: Shakib Al Hasan reflects on Bangladesh's poor performance with the bat
Pakistan captain Babar Azam expresses satisfaction with the team's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Steven Finn discusses Pakistan's pace and reverse swing capabilities
Carlos Brathwaite discusses Babar Azam's captaincy and batting performance
Others: The match was played on October 31, 2023
The net run-rate played a role in Pakistan's win
Fahkar Zaman was named Player of the Match
